meanings.sent1: The seepiest spot in the sponge soaked up all the water.
meanings.sent2: The swamp was at its seepiest after heavy rain.
meanings.sent3: The seepiest part of the roof made it leak like a sieve.
meanings.sent4: Her seepiest thoughts slowly spread through her mind.
meanings.sent5: The seepiest sound of dripping water echoed in the cave.

meanings.sent1: This cloth is seepiest, but that one is even more absorbent.
meanings.sent2: The seepiest fabric allowed water to pass through quickly.
meanings.sent3: The seepiest river in the valley was still not as wet as the ocean.
meanings.sent4: His seepiest shirt was like a sponge compared to the others.
meanings.sent5: The seepiest soil absorbed the rain like a thirsty plant.
